title: Tales of Old: Greek Mythology: Volume 1
description: Greek mythology has stood the test of time as the stories are passed down from one generation to the next. Now the most exciting adventures have been brought to you as short stories. With eight action packed retellings, follow the adventures of gods and heroes alike as they attempt to slay monsters, and each other...Volume 1 retells the first three labours of Hercules, the heartbreaking tragedy and subsequent defeat of Medusa, Hades' quest for love, and both the heroic and less than appealing sides of Zeus.
author: Johnathon Nicolaou
